response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am proposing a special introductory price of $14,000 for you. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
